About Us



OUR MISSION : Save Time,
Easy Search !!


Our system comprise of a process in which a technician will get register and provide us with some basic details. The user who want to hire labour will select from list the type of labour and we will fetch his/her present location and where he wants his work to be done. Our portal will provide user with the list of labourers who are presently active and are connected to server with hire me option so that we can provide our users with free labour rather than keep waiting for them long until they finish their old works.
